description:
Features:
*Branching story arcs and multiple endings
*Unique, vibrant characters.
*Bittersweet love and romantic illustrations of young nurses.
*Unpredictable plot twists
*If ER was a visual novel: life, love and medicine.

Story
Asuka Osachi, a ditzy and easy going girl, graduates high school and enrolls in Teito Nursing School with her younger sister, Nao. 
With their two classmates and teacher; Itsuki, Sakuya, and Kaede, the girls will laugh together, cry together, and experience natural growing pains as they learn medicine together.
name: Nurse Love Addiction
intro: Follow Asuka Osachi; a ditzy girl training to be a nurse at "Teito Nursing School".ã€€Experience her story as she and her classmates, discover love and medicine.
